title: Self-Regulated Learning Strategies to Enhance Retention and Effectiveness in MOOC Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Program Enhancing Sustained Engagement and Learning Effectiveness for MOOC Learners by Applying Self-Regulated Learning Strategies in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify self-regulated learning strategies (metacognitive activities, time management, environmental structuring) and apply them to actual learning contexts within four weeks.
Over 80% of participants can develop specific action plans to enhance self-efficacy and task value during the learning process
Using a rubric to assess learning effectiveness, learners can achieve at least 70% of their target goals independently

resources: Mobile Survey Instrument for Tracking Learning Outcomes
Offline Collaborative Learning Tools (Flipcharts, Post-it Notes)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
